TopicTitle: Is it normal that KSP2 is using 7GB of internet so far this month?

Articles.Content:
I just noticed on my PC data usage that KSP2 has used 7 GB of network data in March, and I didn't think it would have used any.
This is 3GB for first release, and 4GB for the 1st patch. 

I teach online using KSP 1 & 2, but screensharing through zoom shouldn't count as KSP using data, so I'm a little confused.

Comp specs:

  • Windows 11
  • AMD Ryzen 7 5700G
  • 64GB RAM
  • RTX 3060Ti

Curious if anyone lese has seen this come up?

-Teacher Tom
